label: 花押
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: A monogram (or monograms) affixed to a document and representing the name(s) of the issuing authority or his chancellery officers. The format and shape of kaō changed over time, having little bearing by Kamakura times to one's actual name. See ari han.　[在判]
